string.text: Obtain an artifact
Defend the stalker camp
Barkeep asked me to defend a stalker camp at the Garbage from a bandit attack.

A group of stalkers is coming to me, and I am personally interested in their safe arrival. They stopped not far from the Bar. One repentant criminal element reported almost voluntarily that they are to be attacked soon. So head there and protect their camp from the attack.
Help stalkers fight off attackers
Barkeep said that bandits are pressing stalkers at Agroprom. They are holding on, but it is unknown for how long. Need to run there and help them.

Basically, here is the deal. Recently a group of stalkers went to Agroprom. The last time they were in touch, they said they found something valuable in the underground, but bandits pressed them. They are holding on for now, but can't leave either. Will you help them?
Destroy bandits at the Garbage
Barkeep asked me to finish off a group of bandits that took a fancy to the Garbage territory.

Work, work... what do we have here?.. Aha! So, look: can you whack a bandit gang at the Garbage? Duty screams a lot about law and order, but they never get around to it; truth be told, these bandits are rare scum, they've annoyed everyone, so they won't walk for long. Only the one who makes it first will cut some dough... and drinks are on me, that's for sure.
Destroy mercenaries and bandits
Remove a group of mercenaries and bandits blocking the passage through the Rostok factory territory.

Not far from here, at the Rostok factory, a group of mercenaries settled in. They got along with bandits and now want to close the passage through the factory together. You understand yourself - this is a misunderstanding, it must be solved quickly. Dutyers and some experienced guys already went to educate them, only they haven't been seen coming back yet... So you... check how things are there. I pay nicely.
Destroy mercenaries
It's simple: Clear the farmstead of mercenaries.

There is a small farmstead at the Army Warehouses. It was convenient to meet with the right people there, take-give goods, and all that... you got it. And now mercenaries settled there and don't seem to plan to leave anytime soon. Only this doesn't suit me very well. So, I need the farmstead to become free in the near future. I don't care what happens to the tenants.
Clear the bandit camp
Destroy the bandit camp in the Wild Territory.
Bandits in the Wild Territory. We cannot allow these scum to breed unsanitary conditions right next to the Bar. Their camp must be cleared.
Destroy the dog lair
Destroy the lair of mutant dogs in the Wild Territory.
Several of our guys went on an expedition, one returned. All torn up, bloody, glassy eyes. Most likely ran into dogs. There is a whole pack of them. So, find their lair and kill every last one.
Bandits at Agroprom
Destroy a group of bandits at Agroprom.

I remember, somehow in '94 racketeers stuck to me: come on, pay up. Ooh, I suffered back then, I had a restaurant. There was no justice for them back then! And suddenly I find out that this same gang is now operating at Agroprom, collecting percentages for finding artifacts! But here my arms are long. I even know where exactly they settled. Be kind, punish them.
Destroy the snork lair
Destroy the snork lair in the Dark Valley.

Yes... It seems those who say the Zone is expanding are right. Several snorks were spotted in the Dark Valley, they weren't seen there before. Well, some people started to panic here. Duty promised to destroy the snorks, but they just can't get around to it. Will you take it?
Find "Meat Chunk"
Get "Meat Chunk" - an artifact that helps healing.

Recently some holy rollers stopped by, left an order for a "Meat Chunk". You know yourself, they have an interest in this healing artifact... rotten miracle workers, damn it! Ye-eah... So do you take it? In principle, I don't force you.
Find "Crystal Thorn"
Find the artifact "Crystal Thorn".
"Slime"?.. No, not that. "Crystal Water"?.. No, wrong again... Phew! "Crystal Thorn", oh right! So, look: a collector ordered the artifact "Crystal Thorn". Will pay well for the work. Do you take it?
Find "Night Star"
Find the artifact "Night Star" - help the domestic military-industrial complex.

Need the artifact "Night Star". Unfortunately, it doesn't grant wishes - verified, but it can enrich you quite well. Scientists give good money for it. They say they are crafting something military based on it... Well, so what?
Find "Flash"
Find the artifact "Flash".
The task is simple, and the payment is good. Need to find the artifact "Flash". Don't even ask who ordered it and why. Do you take it?
Find "Goldfish"
Find the artifact "Goldfish".

Strelok, do you know the fairy tale about the Golden Fish? There, there! Also many jokes about it. So, there is an old man who wants to catch it. Basically, need the unique artifact "Goldfish". External customer. Will you help?
Find a psi-suit
Search somewhere in the abandoned laboratories of the Dark Valley.

There was a time when laboratories in the Dark Valley worked: kept looking for how to protect brains from psi-emission. Only they worked too slowly, yes... So, it seems there was one successful attempt after all, and a suit is lying around somewhere there, in which you can even kiss a controller... Aha, even so. If you drag this thing to me, I won't forget it.
Find the foreigner's gun
Need to find the "Desert Eagle" of the vanished foreigner.

A foreigner appeared in our parts... Was his name Gordon, or something? Moreover, by all habits - an experienced stalker, only somehow strange, silent... Well okay, that's not the point. Still, he vanished somewhere in the Zone. And he had one very interesting thing - a "Desert Eagle". I'd like to look at it closer...
Find "Vintorez"
Find a modified "Vintorez" in the Radar area.

So, such a story happened here. A guy rushed in - pockets bulging with money! Started hiring people for his company, not the experienced ones, but the flashy ones, buying equipment in packs... I had a tuned "Vintorez" - a miracle, not a gun - so like a fool I sold it to him. Didn't lose money, won't lie... Only this whole company quickly got covered somewhere in the Radar area. Well, pity the people, of course... But others will know now: you can't pave a road through the Zone with just dough. Yes, so I still pity that "Vintorez" - such a gun and rotting somewhere! Find it, eh? Good fee is on me!
Kill a serviceman
Need to finish off an unknown serviceman.
I need you to deal with one military guy... and don't ask who he is, and why the hell I need it! Just do the deed. Well? Can I rely on you?
Kill a stalker
Finish off one of the stalkers.

You know, there are people about whom you'd never say anything bad... You trust them, right? Rely on them like on yourself... Only suddenly you find out that he is some son of a bitch so cunning and lying that... Anyway, there is a serious matter: need to settle scores with one guy for everything. Do it, and the rest is on me.
Kill a stalker from "Monolith"
Find the trader's former friend and help him die.

Once I had a friend... unbelievable, right? Eh... and we came to the Zone together, when none of this even existed. And what didn't we do, where didn't we climb... yes, we were young, reckless... Only it was always not enough for him. He wanted to go to the center of the Zone and pulled me, but I refused - and rightly so... We quarreled badly then, and he left alone... Only they tell me they saw him there... he stands for "Monolith" now. So here is the thing, Strelok... I ask you as a human - find him, and... basically, so he doesn't suffer, he must be already... He was like a brother to me, understand?
Kill Vampire
Find and kill the stalker nicknamed Vampire.

That's it, this guy got to me!.. I'm talking about Vampire; do you know him or not? Ooh, bastard! He sucks not blood from people, but luck. Whoever goes with him - everyone dies, only he is alive and healthy! Fifth time already! In short, something unclean here. There is a strong desire to lay flowers on this Vampire's grave... Well, do you agree?
Kill Sparrow
Find Sparrow and avenge the death of another stalker.

Nobles, damn it!.. Pushkins with Lermontovs!.. As if idiots walking under anomalies and bullets every day wasn't enough, they also took duels into fashion! No, just imagine: we had a dispute here... no one even remembers what about. Only these two idiots decided to spill blood. And here you go: one went and died... what a stalker he was! and the second - Sparrow is his name - quickly bailed, because I myself would have put a bullet in his guts at the first opportunity. Find him. I'm sure he hasn't managed to get out of the Zone yet. Will you do it?
Get a flesh eye
Find a flesh eye for Barkeep.

Soon we have a holiday, and there will be a festive dinner, and some local gourmets in especially high spirits (won't point fingers) will definitely want to try my signature dish - flesh eyes in pork sauce. That is, in their own juice with mayonnaise. Anyway, need the eye of this beast and quickly.
Get a boar hoof
Find a boar hoof for Barkeep.

Did you know we are harvesting horns and hooves? It's a big rarity now. Excellent decorations are made from local mutated hooves, I know a jeweler, he is interested. So go ahead, find a boar hoof, and money will arrive in your pocket.
Defend Duty outpost
Defend Duty outpost at the Garbage.

So, you surely met our guys at the Garbage. They are something like an external cordon there, protecting the Bar from mutants coming from the Dark Valley. Information arrived that a large pack of boars is approaching them right now. Help them beat off the wave of mutants, I won't remain in debt.
Destroy zombies
At Yantar destroy zombified Dutyers.

Recently we sent a group to Yantar. Unfortunately, no one from the group returned. I was reported that near the mobile laboratory of scientists at Yantar several zombified stalkers from the group were seen. We cannot allow them to remain in this terrible state. Find and destroy what they have become.
Remove a dog pack
Remove a dog pack at the Garbage.

We, of course, do not assign tasks to stranger stalkers. On the other hand, this task is simple, so there is no sense in chasing our guys. So, listen. Need to clear a small lair of beasts at the Garbage. One of our groups is already working there, so in case of trouble there is somewhere to retreat. On the other hand, it is desirable that there are no troubles, because there are few beasts - no more than a dozen. Most likely dogs: a migration of a sufficiently large pack was recently noticed in this area. You can proceed to the task.
Destroy a stalker camp
Destroy a stalker camp at Agroprom.

There is one delicate matter, but our guys cannot be involved in its execution in any way. It is unprofitable for our allies to have neutrals present at the factory near Agroprom Research Institute. The task is this: clear the industrial zone from the presence of stalkers, whoever they are and whatever factions they belong to. Is everything clear?
Destroy a mercenary squad
Destroy a mercenary squad at the Rostok factory.

So, the task is this: need to destroy a squad of snipers of the mercenary faction. Situation: these snipers hold the upper floor of the construction complex. Estimated quantity: not less than two, not more than five. Armed, apparently, with sniper rifles. Advice: don't meddle with them during the day.
Clear the bandit base
Clear the main bandit base in the Dark Valley.

It is necessary to conduct a raid on the main bandit base and destroy the maximum amount of enemy manpower. It's in the Dark Valley. Where the unfinished scientific center is. Enemy strength: about thirty militants; armed with light automatic weapons, pistols, shotguns. Is everything clear?
Destroy snorks
Clear tunnels of snorks in the Yantar sector.
This time we'll have to do some cleaning. Tunnels in the Yantar sector are simply bursting with snorks: there are about a dozen of them there. Yes, now you can't sit out a storm there, like before...
Destroy a flesh pack
Destroy a flesh pack in the Wild Territory.

We recorded the movement of a large pack of beasts... Very nasty pig-like mutants, which everyone calls fleshes. Now they are in the Garbage area. All our people are busy, but these beasts must be destroyed. The work is specific, we will pay.
Destroy pseudodogs
Clear a pseudodog lair at the Army Warehouses.

Our allies reported the discovery of a monster lair in the territory near the military warehouses. Presumably, a pack of pseudodogs. We have no need to make noise there right now, so this is a task for a neutral. Will you take it?
Destroy a mercenary outpost
Not far from the military warehouses destroy a mercenary outpost.

Recently the activity of mercenary groups increased, several attacks on scientists, researchers of the Zone were made. This cannot be left unpunished. Need to perform a small punitive operation. Object - mercenary outpost near the military warehouses, behind the abandoned village.
Mercenaries in the Wild Territory
Destroy mercenaries in the Wild Territory.
A group of scientists plans to conduct research in the Wild Territory. But recently it's unsafe there, mercenaries became active. Ensure that there are no more mercenaries in the Wild Territory.
Kill bandits
Kill bandits who infiltrated the Wild Territory.
I'll be brief. Bandits bypassed our outposts at the Bar and are now in the Wild Territory. They need to be eliminated.
Destroy a controller
Destroy a controller at Yantar.

To perform this task, it is necessary to possess special skills. Scientists informed us that at Yantar near the entrance to the underground laboratory (in the central building) they spotted a controller. Controllers are very dangerous, but I am sure you will handle it.
Destroy Freedomers
Clear the abandoned village at the Army Warehouses of Freedomers.
In the abandoned village at the Army Warehouses the activity of Freedom patrols increased. Clear the village of militants. After completion, a special reward awaits you.
Destroy bandits
Destroy bandits at the Garbage.

The operational situation is unfavorable, bandits are concentrating in the Garbage and Dark Valley area. The best solution will be to strike two preemptive blows simultaneously! Our fighters will take care of the Valley, you get the Garbage.
Find a modified rifle
Near military warehouses obtain a sample of modified rifle LR300.

Someone is helping mercenaries. Just recently they started walking with assault rifles modified for sniper fire. You understand yourself, a dangerous toy. I am interested in such a gun. Gratitude will be adequate, do not doubt.
Neutralize Poker
Neutralize the bandit Poker.

Object's nickname - Poker. One of the most cruel bandit leaders, a bastard and rapist... His head is clearly not in order: rumor has it, he earned some rare disease in the Zone. Now he often has total memory lapses, and when he comes to, doesn't remember where he is and who. Nevertheless, always armed and very aggressive. Presumed location: Dark Valley. Ready for the task?
Find Dutyer's weapon
Dutyer asks to find his weapon somewhere in the Dark Valley.

Well, had to screw up like that. What does the Zone do to brains. Nerves seem strong, never feared anything, and then this. Still have this howl in ears. Everything went as usual. There was a sortie to the Dark Valley, sat with Krivoy in ambush covering the main group, and then as I heard the howl, such horror seized. Damn, I don't even remember how I ended up at Cordon. When returned to base, Voronin almost shot me on the spot: he just issued me an improved gun for good service, so to speak. And here... I panicked and bolted, so apparently left it there. If you could bring it to me, because where am I now without a normal weapon.
Clear snork lair
At Yantar destroy a snork lair.

I want to offer you a small sum of money, which you will receive if the snorks inhabiting the swamps stop distracting me and my colleagues. Sometimes during experiments, it's simply impossible to concentrate.
Destroy wild dog lair
In the Wild Territory clear a dog lair.

In the Wild Territory there is a lair of mutant dogs, I want you to go and clear it. These mutants are dangerous for our expeditions. I know zoologists won't support me, but here, agree, is not a zoo. Such creatures spread rabies, plague and God knows what else.
Bring "Fireball"
Get artifact "Fireball" for scientists to research.

We managed to obtain an artifact in laboratory conditions! This is a breakthrough! Now the whole world will hear about our successes. And Nobel Prize is just around the corner! This is a unique artifact - "Pellicle". Its main quality is protection from chemical burns. Want me to gift it to you in the name of science? However, one request - in return I need the artifact "Fireball", know such? Unique thermal properties of its surface require detailed study.
Find "Gravi"
Deliver artifact "Gravi" for scientists.

We came close to understanding the nature of gravity, in fact, very soon we will be able to create a new generation of engines on antigravity basis, and, quite possibly, the road to stars will open for us. For this we need the artifact "Gravi".
Get "Jellyfish"
Artifact "Jellyfish" is needed by scientists for research.

Our research complex is on the threshold of discovering the secret of space and time. Possibility of teleportation is not fiction! "Vortex" is an anomaly that compresses space, and not just gravitationally affects objects, as some of my fossilized theoretical opponents think, sitting in warm research institutes, diligently chewing chalk. Their glasses will fog up when they find out what results science can achieve in field conditions! Get me the artifact "Jellyfish", please.
Get "Moonlight"
Provide scientists at Yantar with "Moonlight".

We urgently need materials to continue research in the field of energy. You see, we learned to generate electricity using artifacts. True, efficiency is not high enough yet. We achieved best results with artifact "Moonlight". Bring us a sample for further experiments.
Get "Urchin"
Scientists need artifact "Urchin" to improve suits.

You probably know that our suits possess the best protection from radiation. The secret is that we impregnate them with essence from a special, quite rare, artifact. For manufacturing the next batch of suits we need such an artifact. You call it "Urchin".
Bring a unique suit
Bring an unusual suit from underground laboratory X-16.

We have business for you. We recently hired a stalker to penetrate inside the laboratory. Even then I noticed his unusual suit, it gave off tangible heat. The stalker said this suit heals wounds by itself. Basically, the stalker didn't return from the laboratory. No! Don't think we have anything to do with it! And his suit is probably still lying there. I would with pleasure receive it for study.
Bring a snork foot
Getting a snork fragment in these parts is not a problem.

We met Semenov when I was reading lectures on genetics at the university, and he was my student. So I became his scientific supervisor. Back then we were only slightly opening the veil of secrecy of genome modification. What am I about? Ah, yes. For genetic research we will need samples of fresh muscle tissue cells of a snork. For gene material you will have to go to the swamps. There is a hypothesis that snorks as a species are a new step of human evolution. To know for sure, need a DNA sample!
Get a flesh eye
Find a flesh eye for eggheads.

Good news, young man: we have a very interesting task for you! I think you, as a thinking personality possessing sufficient life experience, will appreciate the whole revolutionary nature of my colleagues' idea. The fact is that research showed: eyes of creatures called in common parlance flesh, are equipped - are you listening carefully - with olfactory receptors! Thus, they not only see with eyes, but also smell with them! We are preparing for an operation to transplant this eye to one of... our volunteer assistants. I believe a real furor awaits us! But we need a donor organ. Will you help us?
Get a boar hoof
Bring a boar hoof to scientists.

Greetings to you... uh... wanderer! Glad you decided to visit us: we just need a person to participate in a very important experiment. Colleague Benter wants to try to cook something edible from local fauna for a practical experiment on researching the influence of mutated protein on human organisms. For now we decided to stop on boars. We need a ham. Boar leg, you understand? If you take this case, I ask you, choose a well-fed individual.
Find a pseudodog tail
Provide scientists with a pseudodog tail for experiments.

Hello, colleague! We still can't solve the mechanism of amazing properties observed in pseudodogs, so decided to change the vector of our search. This time we start from the end... Why are you smiling? What makes you so... ah, yes. I seem to understand. You see, young man, we need the tail of this creature, located at the end... yes, at the end of the body. We were not talking about reproductive organs of this mammal at all! For them, possibly, you will have to take a walk next time.
Get a bloodsucker jaw
Get a bloodsucker jaw for scientists.

Oh, stalker, glad to see you! Listen... You have already encountered bloodsuckers in your travels, right? If not, we would like for this to happen. As soon as you can, bring us the lower jaw of a representative of this species - and with all, so to speak, cutlery. Unfortunately, can't initiate you into details of the experiment... possibly, it will negatively affect the stability of your psyche. We will wait.
Camp destruction
Find an item
Beat off mercenary attack
Help stalker camp fight off attackers near military warehouses.

There is a group of stalkers, living near military warehouses. Normal guys, understand that the Zone is a place of freedom, that laws are generally not applicable here, and one must just live right, by own morality. And so they are thinking now whether to join us or not, yes. Need to help them fight off mercenaries, huh? And we'll throw you some equipment.
Defend the Barrier
Defend the Barrier near military warehouses from monsters.
Monsters are pushing from the Scorcher side again. Help the guys at the Barrier to fight off. I guarantee a reward.
Destroy military camp
Destroy military camp near Agroprom Research Institute.

Military is systematically seizing the Zone. We need to slow down this process, otherwise the Zone will turn into a scientific-research zoo. One of the military camps is located near "Agroprom" Research Institute. If you manage to clean this place, it will help at least slow down the seizure of the Zone by military.
Destroy mercenary outpost
Clear mercenary outpost near warehouses.

Listen. The deal is that we need to deal with the mercenary outpost. Could have left them alone, they know how to shoot well... only they became insolent beyond measure - climbing onto our territory, trying to bribe my people. Time to teach them a lesson. How about it, will you do it?
Destroy Duty group
Clear Duty fighter group at Rostok factory.

How about hunting a little? A squad of Duty cleaners appeared at Rostok factory. There is a good chance to arrange a surprise for them. Duty constantly sends out their guys to run after monsters, and under the noise kill anyone they don't like. Need to destroy this group, otherwise soon Duty will finally hook onto the factory. Shouldn't be many people there: three-four veterans plus a couple of rookies.
Bring a bulletproof vest
Bring a new model army bulletproof vest.

Some of the military got new model bulletproof vests. Inner lining of these things is impregnated with some healing ointment, or something... basically, shallow wounds heal like on a dog. And imagine what luck: recently a dozen soldiers in such vests rushed to Yantar, and six returned on their own feet and three more on their shoulders. Get it? One remained there. If you get his vest, we'll figure it out and make such for ourselves too.
Kill Duty security chief
Kill the Duty security chief, trying to do it as quietly as possible.

It would be good if the Duty security chief quietly disappeared. Then they will have a little mess, and I can infiltrate several guys into their faction. Or even, what the hell... okay, won't get my hopes up ahead of time. I advise you to process the client from afar and quietly, without raising noise.
Kill Captain Ivantsov
Kill the assistant of the Duty leader, Captain Ivantsov.

The task is difficult, I warn you immediately, but it is worth it. Need to punish Ivantsov - there is such a henchman of this Duty commander. Engaged in the dirtiest work: punitive expeditions, raids... If you knew how many of our guys he hanged! Time to deal with this trash once and for all. If you decide to do it, I advise you to arm yourself well first thing.
Kill Colonel Petrenko
Kill Colonel Petrenko - one of the founding fathers of the Duty faction.

Colonel Petrenko... I don't know if you heard this name, met him or not, but it would be good for you to meet. This man is one of the founders of Duty and one of our most terrible enemies. Try to make your conversation end quickly... for him. Can you handle it?
Destroy a neutral
Find and destroy a neutral stalker.
There is a man, hanging around nearby here. He pulled such a trick, he shot one of ours once. And such things cannot be forgiven. Taking the case? We'll pay, don't worry.
Kill a Duty commander
Destroy one of the Duty commanders.
I pay for the head of anyone from Duty leadership! Kill him - come back for the reward.
Kill Scarecrow
Kill the stalker nicknamed Scarecrow.

We destroy monsters, only for us it is a question of survival, not profit. Mutant populations are not so numerous; besides, they are also living beings, so we cannot allow their complete destruction. Some individuals do not understand this. A clear example: there is a stalker, called Scarecrow. He got his nickname not just like that, but because he got the hang of making stuffed animals for sale from these poor fellows. We warned him, only to no avail. Will you do a good deed for Mother Earth?
Kill Barin
Kill the stalker nicknamed Barin.

Boor, sycophant, hypocrite, coward... he is also stalker Barin. As you see, a man of wonderful spiritual qualities, which helped him climb into the upper echelons of Duty. Now he deals with providing the faction with supplies and food, although from time to time he still participates in raids. Need to get rid of him... especially since almost all Duty connections regarding supplies are tied specifically to Barin.
Boar for dinner
Bring a boar leg.
We have a festive dinner planned here in honor of Bob Marley's birthday. You, brother, get us a tastier boar leg, eh? Or better two! Jah won't forget you!..
Destroy bloodsucker lair
Clear bloodsucker lair in the village near military warehouses.

Have you met a bloodsucker? Horror, right? And I recently went to the village near military warehouses, thought to get rich with artifacts. And imagine - I see a bloodsucker, a black one, all in scars. Sitting over a corpse, doesn't see me. I got scared and ran away from there... I ran in vain, he heard me and chased me, and immediately such a howl rose around... then I realized he wasn't alone. I think they have a lair there. If you could drive them away from there, I would give you one rare artifact that I found a couple of days ago.
Kill a stalker
Destroy the traitor
Baldy asks to kill a stalker who ran away with very rare artifacts.

I recently went for artifacts with one stalker, searched near the Scorcher itself. Found so much, even found a couple of artifacts I've never seen before at all, even in photographs. So this son of a bitch set me up. At the last overnight stay he slipped away somewhere and stashed the most expensive artifacts. And also told me lies, like, they disappeared themselves. And a couple of days ago I saw one of those very rare artifacts at Barkeep's. And such anger took me... Anyway, stalker, if you can find him - give him a lead greeting from me. Or maybe you'll find out where his stashes are and find the second artifact. It's worth it, believe me.
Kill a master stalker
For killing each master, the mercenary is ready to pay well. The fewer masters, the easier for mercenaries.

We are not interested in having walking tanks wandering the Zone: heavily armed stalkers in exoskeletons. Work becomes only harder and more dangerous from this. And the fewer of them - the better for us. Kill one such - get a reward.
Obtain a monster body part
Destroy Freedom fighter
One stalker, a former Dutyer, who knew a lot of information about important objects in Pripyat, recently defected to Freedom, need to kill him before he blabs too much.

Listen here. We have maps of Pripyat. Not modern ones, but old, military ones, made in the early nineties. The most important thing on them is the designation of all military objects: underground warehouses, bomb shelters. Now there is little use from this, of course, but if we suddenly find a road to Pripyat - this information will become priceless. The problem is this. One of the officers defected to Freedom, and he knew about this information. Anyway, need to destroy him before he blabs too much.
Return for reward
Bring the promised item to the customer
Find an improved suit
Nimble told about a bandit stash where they hid loot.

While sitting in captivity, heard bandits talking about their stash where they put loot. Heard they hid a cool jacket there, and the next day some monster took a fancy to their stash for itself. So fancied it that they are afraid to go there now. Bring me the suit, be a friend, and I'll pay you.
Can't offer anything right now.
And what do you want to talk about?
Well done, deserved a reward!
What is it?
Look what we have today:
Cover Duty squad
Cover Duty squad from bandit attack in Dark Valley.

Still, I finally managed to hammer into the thick heads of Dutyers that it's high time to clear the Garbage from bandits... And Duty will expand its territory, and my regular clients will be spoiled less often. Well, anyway, the thing is that Duty command decided to cut off the influx of bandits from the Dark Valley for a start. They sent out, you know, a barrier squad and discovered that bandits are not happy about this. Who would have thought! So what I'm getting at - would you help the fighters consolidate at the entrance to the Dark Valley, eh? I will reward worthily.
No tasks right now.
What do you want to discuss?
Good job! Task completed.
Listening.
There are tasks:
Nothing at the moment.
About which task do you want to talk?
Task completed... and here is the fee!
And what's with the task?
There is something:
Sorry, nothing at the moment.
Regarding which task would you like to talk?
You handled the task perfectly! Allow me to present you a reward.
I am listening to You.
I can offer you the following:
Destroy bandit camp
Clear bandits at the Garbage.

Recently bandits multiplied like dirt, preventing honest people from trading... So: blow to the Garbage - I was informed that these scum settled not far from the vehicle graveyard. You'll sort it out on the spot - everyone will thank you, well and a worthy reward from me won't be delayed. Agreed?
Bandit camp at ATP
Destroy bandits at the factory.
Bandits clustering at ATP again. Already guessed what the task will be? Then... legs in hands - and forward. As soon as you pass our common hot greeting to them, come back - I will reward. Deal?
Bandits near Agroprom Institute
Destroy bandits near Agroprom Institute.
A bandit squad appeared under the institute at Agroprom, preventing my diggers from collecting junk... Solve the problem - something will be due from me.
Clear the area
Destroy mutants.

There is a matter, not very heavy. They want to bring a foreign tourist to me here. He threw some money to my pals to look at the Zone. Well and where they will lead him, need to clean the area from mutants. Will you take it?
Eliminate two bandits at the Garbage
Make the passage to one of the best places in the Zone free.

Recently one of the best places in the Zone became inaccessible for lovers of the beautiful. At the Garbage... Uh-huh, exactly at the Garbage there is a nook in which you forget about dirt, about money, about blood... Or rather, used to forget. Because now two dirty ugly mugs sit there, threatening to bleed anyone who doesn't pay them for visiting this edge. Eliminate them, I have nowhere to lead tourists.
Kill bloodsucker
Destroy bloodsucker in the Dark Valley.

They say military left the Dark Valley. And after that monsters poured out from all cracks. Stalkers already saw a bloodsucker there, moreover an unusual one - it's not afraid of open spaces. Basically, when the rumor reaches scientists, they will definitely want to research this bloodsucker. And I want to be the person who sells the corpse to scientists. Your task is to kill the bloodsucker, and then I take everything on myself.
Find "Jellyfish"
Get artifact "Jellyfish".
One person from the Big Land ordered "Jellyfish" from me. Work is not dusty, and money not big, but you'll turn around quickly. Agree!
Find "Stone Flower"
Find artifact "Stone Flower".
There is a task for "Stone Flower". From jewelers, by the way. So let's not upset beautiful ladies, eh? Get it - fee and a bottle on me, to drink for their health...
Find "Night Star"
Find "Night Star" - a rare and expensive artifact.

There is one little task... somewhat unpleasant. Seems from the military - they are engaged in developing new means of protection. So, an order came for "Night Star". This is a rare artifact, it can protect from bullets quite well... So do you take it? Paying well!..
Find "Meat Chunk"
Find wound healing artifact "Meat Chunk".
There is an order for an artifact, need one that can heal wounds, called "Meat Chunk"! They have a clinic or something. Get it - get money yourself and help people.
Find improved Fort 12
Last known owner - commander of the checkpoint under the ruined bridge.

Eh, such a stupid fashion for fancy weapons started, no one wants to shoot from ordinary ones anymore, even rookies!.. Basically, there is an order for one improved gun. According to rumors, the commander of the military, who collect money for passage under the bridge, has a Fort 12 with a fat magazine. Will you get it?
No work right now...
What do you want to discuss?
Well, good job, good job! Work for an A - hold the earnings.
What is it?
Here look what we have:
Nothing at the moment.
About which task do you want to talk?
Task completed... and here is the fee!
And what's with the task?
There is something:
No, nothing. Another time.
I completed this task.
I refuse to perform this task.
Kill bandit leader
Most likely to find him at the Garbage.

You'll have to finish off one handsome guy - he is one of the main ones among bandits. Recently bandits by his order intercepted my courier and gutted him to zero, and conversation is short with those who touch my people... Anyway, do the deed - I won't remain in debt. So how about it, take it?
Kill trader stalker
Destroy a stalker... Yes, not the best job of all.

I had some disagreements with one trader. Well, he doesn't want to work with me, to hell with him! Only won't allow spreading vile rumors. Basically, need to end him, so others don't get loose. So they know who is the boss here...
Kill rookie stalker
Finish off a rookie stalker, who, maybe, isn't a rookie at all.
There is one here, keeps hanging around, pretends to be a rookie, only he is somehow strange... Anyway, if he disappears unnoticed, it will be a good favor to me. Understand what I mean?
Kill Demon
Eliminate one of Sidorovich's trade competitors

Demon, aka Oleg Gusarov... former special forces. As long as he didn't meddle in other people's business, I had no complaints about him - a loner is a loner. Only someone told me here, Demon is gathering people to crush Cordon under himself and rake in the transfer of loot from the Zone. And this is already a serious problem, and it needs to be solved quickly. Taking the order?
Kill Father Diodor
Kill the man preaching in the Zone against artifact collection and trading them.

I always said: business and religion are two parallel occupations, they can't even intersect closely, and in each other's affairs no-no!.. Only this father, God forgive, Diodor... hmm... well, he can't understand this simple truth. Keeps raving that gathering artifacts, and especially trading them corrupts people to the sinful path not only in the Zone, but in the whole world... well and all in such spirit. He, you understand, calls to destroy artifacts altogether - huh?! Just imagine what he thought up!.. Worst thing, some start falling for the ravings. I approached this Diodor in every possible way, and he keeps bending his line. The deal is: you send him upstairs for an audience... got it, yes? And I give you some solid artifact. So, shake hands?
Kill "sales representative"
Kill "sales representative". Trader watches his reputation.

Imagine, some weirdo hangs around nearby, introduces himself as my sales representative, uses my reputation, you see, and then pushes substandard goods! Broken guns, falling apart armor, expired canned food... I already had a couple of showdowns with dissatisfied people here. In short, I need a person who will communicate with the "sales representative". Up to substandard condition.
Nothing at the moment.
About which task do you want to talk?
Task completed... and here is the fee!
And what's with the task?
There is something:
Nothing at the moment.
About which task do you want to talk?
Task completed... and here is the fee!
And what's with the task?
There is something:
Bring bloodsucker jaw
Bloodsucker tooth attracts luck? Let's see if the bloodsucker gets lucky.

Heard the belief that a bloodsucker tooth attracts luck? As if anomalies let go of one who wears such a tooth on the neck, and artifacts come into hands themselves? Basically, it's all bullshit, but there are blockheads who believe and are ready to pay good money. Bring a bloodsucker jaw, I'll pay you well.
Get pseudodog tail
Drag in a pseudodog tail.

Winter is coming. And what do women in the Big Land like to wear in winter? Correct! They like to wear furs. So a new fashion started, to make various accessories from pseudodog tails. The fur there is somewhat special! In short, there is an order for such a tail. Will you take it?
Nothing at the moment.
About which task do you want to talk?
Task completed... and here is the fee!
And what's with the task?
There is something:
I am about the task.
These tasks are not interesting to me.
Another time.
I take it.
What do I get for this?
I need work. Anything in mind?
Nothing at the moment.
About which task do you want to talk?
Task completed... and here is the small fee!
And what's with the task?
There is something:
Nothing at the moment.
About which task do you want to talk?
Task completed... and here is the fee!
And what's with the task?
There is something:
Nothing at the moment.
About which task do you want to talk?
Task completed... and here is the fee!
And what's with the task?
There is something:
Nothing at the moment.
About which task do you want to talk?
Task completed... and here is the fee!
And what's with the task?
There is something:
Destroy boar lair
Clear boar lair next to Wolf's stash.

Um, my friend and I had a stash not far from here exactly behind the ATP, trees grow thicker there... Recently boars made a lair there. And it turns out we can't get to our stash now. Help - kill the boars, and I will thank you for myself and for my friend.
Destroy mutants at the farm
Wolf asks to clear the farm from mutants.

Although this is the border of the Zone, it's hard for rookies even here. Bandits are half the trouble, they at least understand human language. But mutants - it's very bad with them. Set up a lair at the abandoned farm, occupied the only good place for a transit camp. If you can clear the farm of mutants - something is due from me.
Clear dog lair
Near the southern outpost at the Bar a pack of dogs settled.
Despite our efforts, some monsters still break through from the Garbage side. Yes, you probably saw yourself the pack of dogs to the south of us. Kill them - get a reward.
Camp defense
Bring "Slime".
Get artifact "Slime" for Sviblov.
Strelok, scientists ordered one quite rare artifact from us: "Slime". Finding it will not be simple. So if you take it, I'll reward normally.
Bring "Slug".
Get artifact "Slug" for Sviblov.
Strelok! Scientists ordered an artifact from us again. But, true, now artifact "Slug". Conditions same: find the needed artifact, get some stuff.
Bring "Crystal".
Get artifact "Crystal" for Sviblov.
Help out, Strelok! Scientists sat on the neck again! Give them artifact "Crystal"! And where to get it? Find it - I won't remain in debt. Reward corresponding!
Bring "Battery".
Get artifact "Battery" for Sviblov.

Opa, Strelok! Just in time! Just have business for you. There is an order for one artifact. Sakharov lately became completely insolent, demands only the best, and good artifacts don't just lie on the road. Basically, need to find artifact "Battery". Bring it, won't regret. Will pay generously.
Bring cat tail.
Get cat tail for Sviblov.

There is something in mind, yes... A request for a local cat tail arrived from the "Big Land". From a familiar artist. He visited us once to "paint a place full of decadent charm". We, of course, didn't let him out of the territory, but what there was, he painted notably. So, he claims that from the wool of these very cats very decent pile for brushes is obtained. I, of course, understand, dangerous business, these beasts don't roam alone, but... money is money. And you seem not a rookie anymore. So how about it, Strelok, will you take such a thing?
Bring tushkano head.
Get tushkano head for Sviblov.

Work, you say? There is work. Here Sakharov invited one foreign tourist to the zone. Well, it's customary. Need some souvenir from the Zone for this tourist. So, you bring me a tushkano head, and my guys will make a stuffed animal from it. We'll shove it to this tourist as a souvenir.
Bring poltergeist eye.
Get poltergeist eye for Sviblov.

Greetings, stalker. Basically, a poltergeist eye was urgently needed on the "Big Land". Preferably undamaged. I know, Strelok, that you are an experienced stalker, seen a lot, so, I think, you will cope with such a task. Reward is worthy. Well, and if you don't want to, say immediately. Won't force.
Bring chimera claw.
Get chimera claw for Sviblov.

Tasks, you say? There is a task and just in your line. Met chimeras in the Zone? Here, look how this beast looks. What am I leading to... Work appeared. Good, monetary. Need, means, a claw from this beauty for us. So how about it, like the task?
Bring controller hand.
Sviblov needed a controller hand for some reason.

Ahem... Strelok? Could you get me a controller hand? You see, lately my headaches worsened, migraine tortured. So, Sakharov threw me a recipe here. Well, all ingredients are present, but no controller hand. You get it for me, please. And I will settle with you well.
Bring pseudogiant hand.
Get pseudogiant hand for Sviblov.

There is a task and not an easy one. Will have to sweat. Ready, you say? Basically, scientists made an order for a pseudogiant hand. What, you say? Leg? And the devil knows what it is! Basically, what he walks with. Enterprise is serious, pays very well. But note, pseudogiant is an extremely dangerous beast. I already sent two, they barely crawled back. And you are a serious stalker, know your capabilities. What do you say?
Nothing at the moment.
About which task do you want to talk?
Task completed... and here is the fee!
And what's with the task?
There is something:
I'll talk to Charon. Perhaps he will have tasks for me.
I need to help clear CNPP-2 of "infidels" who have penetrated the territory. We cannot allow just anyone to walk around the territory of the Chernobyl NPP. Then talk to Solomon and report to Charon.
Find 8 snork feet for one of Solomon's guards.

On the way to Pripyat, I was stopped by Deacon - a former bandit who was lucky enough to find the light of the Monolith. He asked me to help clear the territory of "infidel" military. I'm on my way anyway, so I must help my brothers.
I must help my brothers clear the central square of Pripyat from mercenary forces. Talk to Makhon and Charon afterwards.
This spy will regret deciding to step on holy ground! Need to interrogate him, and then talk to Deacon.
I need to rescue an "infidel" named Ghost from the clutches of mercenaries, and then escort him to a safe place. Also worth telling everything to Paramedic.
Talk to Paramedic.
Return to Charon.
Meet and talk to Paramedic.
I received an order to kill Ghost. Well, I'm surprised I wasn't assigned to do this earlier.
That's how fate turned! Need to get to Ghost and help him fight back.

Freedomers asked me to help retake the base from the military. Most likely I'll have to sweat, as there are decent amount of soldiers there. \nIt is important that Lukash and Cap remain alive, otherwise everything will be in vain. Perhaps it will be easier if I mow down at least part of the military before the Freedom squad arrives.
Meet and talk to Lukash.
Snitch asked me to find a "special" folder at the Freedom base. What's in it - I don't need to know. It should be well hidden, so I'll have to crawl around.

Sviblov told that a local bloodsucker is terrorizing his squad. It has eaten so much that they haven't been able to kill it yet, and it still hangs around somewhere in the far part of the base. Sviblov asked to kill it and drag it to him so he can make a stuffed animal out of it. What an idea - to put such a monstrosity somewhere for beauty.

A rat appeared in Sviblov's squad. It is not yet clear who exactly, but Sviblov has a plan: He told everyone in the squad that he organized a stash. I need to take a position by the rocks, and meet the reptile there. Then need to tell Sviblov about the meeting.
Bes needed another gun to storm the mercenary base. Heard that Lefty should be there, so there is my interest here too.
Find documents and a flash drive in laboratory X-10, and take them to Sviblov.

Lefty doesn't mind working for Lukash, but requested a whole mercenary scientific suit for it. What demands! Will have to slash mercs, take the suit off a corpse and repair it if needed. Heard that Borov has the same one for sale.
Lukash asked me to find Lefty and persuade him to join Freedom. Not an easy task, but the reward will be appropriate.
Met a stalker in the Bar, called Sakhaty. He told that bandits locked his buddies in prison... Do bandits have a prison? Anyway, need to talk to Prince, and we'll see from there.
Meet and talk to Bes.

Wow, the story with these friends of Sakhaty got twisted! Had to agree to search for Prince's gun. He agreed to release Sakhaty's friends in exchange for the weapon and money. \nWhat a sly one, this Sakhaty! Dumped everything on me. Hope the reward will be generous, otherwise I'll definitely punch him.
Need to help Sergeant Plichko from Duty kill bandits. Then report to General Voronin about the results.

There are rumors that Semetsky, the Legend of the Zone, has a rich stash! Rumors are supported by a map fragment that was divided into several parts. Maybe it's just a tale, but I can't miss such an opportunity. After all, if Semetsky is truly immortal, surely he managed to collect a lot of interesting things!
I need to find Zheka, Prince's debtor. He should be at the Garbage. Kill him or spare him - doesn't matter. The main thing is to get the money by any means and give it to Prince.

Prince asked me to find a bag of "grass" for him. It should be lying somewhere on the territory of the army warehouses... He said that if I can't find it myself, scientists might help with the search. But they will surely ask for something in return for info.
Varyag throws a challenge: Need to go through four circles of hell through the Agroprom underground with only a knife. As far as I heard, not a single stalker has been able to do this yet.
Need to help Bes exchange with Colonel Petrenko from Duty: Two modified rifles in exchange for a crate of ammo.

Sobolev gave me a radio station, through which he will be able to talk to an old friend. Heavy, damn it! When I'm in the Red Forest, will need to pass the station to Zakhar. Sure he will be very glad.

A traitor appeared among scientists - Docent Dorodin. Sakharov said that Dorodin knows too much, and is ready to sell their joint works for good money. Need to get to the Dark Valley and take a good position where I can quickly eliminate him without unnecessary noise. I was also warned that another scientist will be with him. According to Sakharov, he doesn't play a big role in all this, so he can be left alive. However, they will be in identical suits with Dorodin, so it depends on luck.

Dan asked to get rid of zombies, which became too many on the territory, next to X-16. They don't let security and scientists sleep with their howling and screams, so Dan didn't spare a grenade launcher for me! With it, the business should go both faster and more fun.
Too many mutants bred next to X-18. General Voronin asked me to deal with them.
General Voronin needs the contents of a bandit stash. According to him, there is a bandit nicknamed Zhila, who doesn't mind assisting. Need to meet with him and chat about the stash.
I must find Tolik and talk to him.
Wolf's group needs help. Need to find loner stalkers, they should help.
Bandits went completely nuts - occupied the Rookie Village! Need to help retake it, and then talk to Wolf.
Kruglov told about a rare artifact called "Controller's Heart". One can find such only with the help of a special detector. Search should start from Agroprom, somewhere in the swamp.

Turned out that Snitch heard about Semetsky's map. Moreover, he is ready to help me with the search for the remaining fragments! Not for free, of course: In exchange for fragments he asked to bring Bengal Crystal Soul. Not such a big price for the stash of the Zone Legend! Just need to cook it.
I need to take the case for General Voronin, and then talk to Kruglov.
Prince asked me to get a special Abakan with an integrated collimator. Seems General Voronin gave me a similar one...
Mercenaries attacked Fang. Need to help him fight them off, and then talk.

Turned out that rumors about the foreigner are true: Barkeep asked me to walk with the foreigner, whose name is Freeman. Walk with him around the neighborhood near the Rookie Village, and then return back and talk to Barkeep.

Lefty agreed to fix the broken anomaly detector. According to him, it should track anomalies and show them. But for this will require getting "Mica", "Crystal", "Goldfish", "Soul", "Ruby Spring" and "Flash".
Fanat asked me to find 2 "Gold Chunk" artifacts for him. They are rare, so more often found in the north. Although sure that one can find closer too, if searching well.

What the hell?! In the stash where Borov's courier's PDA was supposed to lie, turned out to be a trap! Good that it was crappy, otherwise would have definitely remained without hands. Need to return to Borov and tell about what happened.
Need to meet and talk to Ghost.

I needed to enter a house, in the bloodsucker village, but something didn't allow doing it, "spitting" me out. Turned out that a whole family of poltergeists settled in the village! What attracted them here? Doesn't matter. Need to kill them to enter the house without problems.
Need to meet and talk to Count.
Caesar handed me a PDA and documents that need to be taken to Count.
Something serious is brewing. I must give the PDA to Fang and talk to him. Very important information should be stored in the PDA.
Need to bring Lefty the artifact "Fiery Soul".
Find and bring 3 bottles of vodka to Antiquarian.
Need to fight off the mercenary attack on the bar.

Charon gave a task to clear the lower floors from a Burer family. Says there should be about six of them there. And also necessary to find and return to Charon one device - "Decoder", which these beasts stole.
One of the guards asked to bring him five cans of food. Promised to thank well.
One of the guards asked to bring him five PDAs. "Infidels" should have such.

Solomon asked to find three cases on the territory of CNPP-2. He put marks on these cases in my PDA. Seems there shouldn't be big problems finding the first two, but regarding the location of the third case Solomon said that need to use teleports. There is a mark for this case too, but on which of the upper levels of the Sarcophagus to search for it, that is a question for now.
Charon sends to clear the Control Bunker from evil spirits. The entrance to the Bunker is somewhere not far from the first teleports.
Charon sends to Pripyat to pick up medicine from Doctor or his courier. Said to search somewhere in the stadium area.

Solomon asked to find a crate with canned food in Pripyat, in the grocery store. I heard there is more than one grocery store in Pripyat. Will have to search. Besides this, he asked to find a container with medicines on the CNPP territory. To find this container, need to talk to Deacon first - he is the commander of the patrol squad at the CNPP.

Mercenaries occupied the base in Pripyat. I must get to Pripyat and meet with Makhon's group. We will definitely banish these "infidels"! \nCharon warned that Makhon is an important member of the brotherhood. He must not die during the assault.

Necessary to go to CNPP again, into the Sarcophagus, and then into the Monolith Control Bunker for underground communication schematics for Ghost. He should show me the passage from Pripyat to the Swamps.
Solomon asked to send a package to the Big Land. For this need to talk to the trader at the Cordon named Barkeep.

Need to capture the Barrier at Warehouses, knocking out the military from there. Cap must remain alive. The task will be completed when Cap takes his place at the Barrier. Need not to lose sight of him.
Snitch sends to carry loot to diggers at Radar: 5 medkits (ordinary), 5 sticks of sausage, 5 bottles of vodka and 5 cans of food. Everything must be transferred to them safe and sound.

Met stalker Tolik when ended up at the Cordon. Should help him get to the stalker camp at the abandoned factory near the bridge at the Cordon. Turned out that Cordon is full of mutants now, and he definitely won't cope alone.
Wolf has a stash where six sets of guns and ammo lie, as well as a PDA. Need to bring the PDA to Wolf and distribute weapons to rookies.
Need to find a stalker nicknamed Varyag somewhere at Agroprom and find out from him about documents from laboratory X-18.
Need to get a modified RG-6 grenade launcher for Petrenko at the Freedom base, converted for NATO M-209 round. Looks like will have to negotiate with the guard of the Freedom arsenal.
To negotiate with the arsenal guard, need to get some grass for him. Seems again will have to go bowing to Prince at the Bar.
Need to go to laboratory X-18, which is in Dark Valley, find at least some information for Fang there.
Fang asked to carry the laptop to Barkeep at the Cordon, which I brought him from X-16, and the Monolith flash drive from X-18.

Well, go to Pripyat again! Need to find Paramedic, he needs help. Again these mercenaries, and Monolith... Won't go through Radar for sure, too dangerous path. Sidorovich said that Doctor can show the road to Pripyat, so will go visit an old acquaintance.

Paramedic said that I need to go to the Control Bunker once more. Apparently, in such a short time something very bad for all of us happened and need to find at least some opportunity to prevent the threat. There is no concrete information, so I will have to act according to the situation.

Cross asked to help his pal nicknamed Jack. He got into a mess not far from the checkpoint at the Cordon. Need to find him somewhere there, before soldiers grab him, and help get out from the checkpoint.

Need to find stalker Lapsha and kill him. For this one bro promised to give transmutation recipe "Giant's Little Brother". Lapsha, he says, was seen at the Garbage, not far from the transition to Dark Valley.

One person was supposed to come to Borov, a courier from the center with important information, and disappeared. No news from him for the second day already. Says that last time he was in touch from Dark Valley. In short, need to go to General Voronin, no one but him can help find the courier or what's left of him. In any case, need to try to find and bring Borov the information that the courier was carrying.

To find the trace of the missing courier, need to go to the abandoned factory, for reconnaissance. Voronin sent his people there recently, but they didn't return. Apparently, bandits killed them... Feel like will have to shoot again.

Well. Information that the courier carried for Borov is gone. Now need to go to Pripyat to Ghost for a copy that might have been preserved with him. But no one from locals knows the road to Pripyat. There is hope that Freedomers might know the road. In short, need to go to Lukash.

For Lukash to tell how to pass to Pripyat, need to bring a container from Radar for him. Says a helicopter crashed there recently, on which scientists were transporting something. This something is in a metal container, and the container is highly radioactive. Well, nothing to be done. Will have to go to Radar into the dead forest, look for this glowing box and carry it to Lukash.
Need to talk to Mervin. Charon said that he can be found here, in the Sarcophagus, next to the "Monolith".
Need to find the first manuscript with main commandments of the "Monolith" brotherhood and return back to Mervin with it.
Need to find the second manuscript with main commandments of the "Monolith" brotherhood and return back to Mervin with it.
Charon sends to Mervin again. This time he is waiting for me in the hotel, in Pripyat, in room #26.
Need to find the third manuscript with main commandments of the "Monolith" brotherhood and return back to Mervin with it.
Need to find the fourth manuscript with main commandments of the "Monolith" brotherhood and return back to Mervin with it.
Need to find the fifth manuscript with main commandments of the "Monolith" brotherhood and then go to the Sarcophagus to Charon.

Not far from the Bar, outside its territory, a chopper fell not so long ago. Where the chopper itself crashed - unknown. Somewhere there, at the end of this road, they just dropped boxes from it, which should still be lying there. Need to find this place and bring everything valuable that survived from there, so mercenaries don't get it. Most importantly, there should be accompanying documents in a fireproof case.

Need to find Prince's stash at Warehouses, somewhere in a ravine, near a rusty helicopter. Take the gun from there and carry to Prince. Prince is hiding at Radar, somewhere in an abandoned tunnel, where the blocked entrance to the old bunker is. There was also a small military base there before.

Need to find the second part of documents for Count. Place where to search for docs, at the old checkpoint, practically behind the territory of warehouses. It's not far from the bloodsucker village there. Also Prince said that several boxes survived, some weapon should remain safe there. Mercs didn't manage to take it - rushed in pursuit of him. If I find anything, can take for myself.

Count sends to meet Caesar at Yantar, in the scientists' bunker. Preliminary need to find Caesar's three flash drives with mercenary codes so he can decrypt the obtained information. Flash drives lie in three stashes on the Bar territory, somewhere in the inner courtyard.
Necessary to find the third part of documents for Count at Yantar, in the outer courtyard of laboratory complex X-16.

Skinflint asked to bring him 10 loaves of rye bread, which only one person nicknamed Baker bakes in the Zone. To find Baker, need to go to trader Sidorovich, who lives on the territory of Glubokoe station, and ask him about Baker.

Skinflint asked to find out about the fate of a courier named Shuttle, who was carrying an important package for him from the Big Land. He disappeared a few days ago in the Wild Territory. Shuttle was last in touch three days ago. Since then neither hide nor hair from him. Have to find Shuttle or what's left of him. And most importantly, return the case with the package to Skinflint. Last time Shuttle was in touch from Rostok. This is uninhabited Wild Territory. People disappear there constantly. Said he looked for a place for a halt for the night in some secluded spot and that's it, after that disappeared. Will have to dig through entire Rostok, but find the case and some information about Shuttle.
Need to find five sacks of flour for Baker in the bloodsucker village at Army Warehouses. Sacks, most likely, were dragged by bloodsuckers to different secluded places. Will have to search carefully.

Need to find and bring Baker's box with spare parts for the stove from Agroprom to Baker. Where Baker hid the box, he himself doesn't remember exactly now. Says, made his way at night along the edge of the swamp, through reeds in the northern direction, and put it somewhere there. Thought, later soon returns and picks it up, but that's how it all turned out. Where he was carried from Agroprom now. In short, need to search more carefully in the swamp area.

Pathfinder sent to Agroprom to Incognito, who waits in a secret place somewhere in catacombs. Need to find the blocked entrance to catacombs not far from the northern building, and then Incognito will open the entrance.

Need to get one very rare artifact for Pathfinder, called "Liquidator". Its only and main property is that when thrown on the ground, it destroys all known anomalies within a radius of 15 meters. This is a reusable artifact. It might be with a group of stalkers calling themselves "Railwaymen". Their leader is a stalker nicknamed Lector. To find these guys, need to go through a secret path that starts at the Rostok factory. Few know about this path. Need to look for it near the concrete fence, opposite the unfinished three-story building, right behind rails and wagons, between metal cabins. This path is one way only, will have to find the way back myself.

Lector asked in exchange for artifact "Liquidator" to help him: find a missing group of three people, led by Sledgehammer. These couriers carried 10 boxes of Antizombin and a Blowout Detector device. Need to look for them in a small forest, which is behind railway tracks, not far from the Railwaymen base. If cross behind the tracks and keep towards the wire mesh fence, so can get into that forest. Need to search every bush there, but find guys or what's left of them. And most importantly, bring what Lector asks.

Zveroboy reported where artifact "Liquidator" can be found and asked to help in one matter: destroy superboars at Rostok by the tunnel, which is not far from the transition to Yantar. In proof of completed work, necessary to bring Zveroboy three superboar hooves.

Zveroboy asks to find and bring him three protective helmets of mercenaries. Need to look for them at Yantar, not far from the main entrance to laboratory complex X-16. Helmets are somewhere in the garage area, maybe a bit further. In the area where the pipe was laid, also can be. In short, will have to thoroughly climb all corners there. For this work promised to give a unique assault rifle, taken from a captured mercenary.

Mechanic Potapov asked to find 7 parts of the manual for creating item 62, aka Gauss Rifle. 

One part of the manual should be with the military in a stash on the Checkpoint territory at Cordon. The remaining six parts of the manual need to be taken from corpses of six stalkers, who "stole" this manual from under the very nose of the military, penetrating to their Base. 

Unfortunately, out of six daredevils no one survived. 
One, having met with a small group of familiar stalkers, ran into a pack of hungry pseudodogs with them somewhere at the "Garbage". 
Second decided to take cover in Agroprom undergrounds, perished there. 
Third climbed for some reason into laboratory X-18, which is in "Dark Valley". He didn't come out from there. 
Fourth disappeared somewhere in the forest at Radar. He contacted, apparently before death itself, said he is hiding in some rocks. 
Fifth reached as far as Pripyat. His trail is lost somewhere in the hotel area. 
Sixth... He was chased longer than others. Wounded. He then sat out for some time with scientists at Yantar. Then, as wounds healed, went for scientists, as a sign of gratitude for treatment, to perform some task in laboratory X-16. But didn't return from there already, disappeared somewhere in labyrinths of X-16.

Kruglov asks to find out what happened to lab assistant Lazarev, who left recently to Agroprom to the swamp, to conduct tests of a new device there, fixing the level and dynamics of anomalous activity growth. Second day no rumors from Lazarev, probably something happened.
Colonel Petrenko set a task to destroy Marsh Crawlers in Dark Valley at the swamp under the bridge. They say these beasts are very tenacious and shouldn't approach them close.

Lukash asks to clear the abandoned military checkpoint at Army Warehouses from a Fractures family. These monsters are extremely treacherous, though slow. Need to be extremely careful with them. Checkpoint in the western part of Warehouses, not far from bloodsucker village.
Solomon asks to find his PDA, which he dropped in the eastern part of CNPP-2. Says that it won't be difficult to find - it lies somewhere on the asphalt path.

Necessary to find a hidden backpack on Lenin Square, in the very center of Pripyat. In it, according to Paramedic, lie in special containers ampoules of "Adulin" - a powerful biochemical agent, which protects human psyche from various psi-influences for a long time. The backpack with its contents needs to be brought to Paramedic.
Necessary to destroy a pack of snorks in Pripyat, in the ferris wheel area.
Need to meet with Illusionist, he waits in the hotel. Need to go up to the second floor, and there will wait in one of the rooms. I don't remember such a stalker...
Damn! How did he find me? Illusionist turned out to be Mervin, who is clearly not happy that I left the brotherhood. In exchange for freedom and things, he ordered me to kill Paramedic.

I'll have to kill Mervin to rid myself and others of danger. And then, can pick up my things and weapon from Ghost. He knows where Mervin's stash is and Paramedic will ask him to go there and take everything that Sorcerer stole from me.
Didn't expect this from Ghost. Is he seriously proposing me to go like this, without gear, and find dynamite? Oh I'll remember this to him...
Before crossing from Pripyat to Swamps, need to return to Ghost. He forgot to pass something from Doctor.
To secure himself, Lefty requested "Groza" from me. Whole, so not a scratch, and also without any modifications.

Need to bring Dan three disks with very valuable information. Disks were lost about five years ago, after the failure of the first scientific expedition to the Zone. Disks with results of analyses and observations of animal mutation were carried by two military from scientists' security, but ran into hungry mutants and were forced to flee, dropping all their equipment. The place where special forces dropped the backpack with provisions, in which lay the disks too, by their description looks most like the territory we now call Garbage. Landmark on terrain where to search - it's somewhere in ravines behind one of the garbage piles.
To find out how to find artifact klondike, need to bring Lector one artifact - "Controller's Heart".
To find artifact klondike in Dark Valley, need to find artifact "Snake Eye". As Lector said, can find it in the forest at Radar, not far from a small gap in barbed wire fence between two boulders.

Need to find five magic protective Amulets and sixth (catalyst) to catalyze the Charm, possessing unique protective properties taken from each of the five ordinal "progenitors" and doubled in degree of protection. 

Description of Amulets (work only on belt): 
"Chimeron" - first order. 10% protection from electroshock and 10% protection from rupture. Slightly radioactive. 

"Dragon" - second order. 10% protection from burns, including chemical. Slightly radioactive. 

"Avalon" - third order. 10% protection from explosions and 10% bulletproofness. Slightly radioactive. 

"Sarkon" - fourth order. 15% protection from radiation. True, along with this, resistance to electroshock somewhat decreases. 

"Garganon" - fifth order. 15% protection from telepathic influence. Slightly radioactive. 

"Catalon" - Amulet-catalyst. Slightly radioactive. If placed together with collected amulets of all five previous orders on the belt, then a process of magical catalysis will occur and instead of six amulets one Amulet-Charm will appear, possessing doubled protective properties of all five ordinal amulets and with all this completely not radioactive. 

As Wanderer said, one of the amulets was with an old digger who died somewhere in the center of Pripyat. Another amulet was with his partner who perished somewhere in catacombs of laboratory X-16. And another amulet was with some scammer whom bloodsuckers tore in the village at Army Warehouses. Nothing is known about other amulets.

To return my weapon and all things that marauders took away, need to find two protective armored suits SKAT-11M at Peacekeepers base and bring them safe and sound to Razuvaev - leader of the marauder gang. These suits should be searched for in the house at the entrance to the base. A mark is set on it. To not incur suspicion and anger of Peacekeepers, should get out of the base secretly - find another exit.

Necessary to find a small gang of teenage marauders and pass them a proposal from Leila. Presumed location of marauders camp is marked on the map. In the end necessary to find out about marauder leader and agree so they leave the city.
